Regain Control of Your Online Experience

In today's age, distractions are everywhere. Stop Doomscroll helps you to manage your online habits effectively. If you find yourself endlessly scrolling through social media or news sites, this extension is designed for you.

Why Use Stop Doomscroll? Doomscrolling can lead to stress and decreased productivity. By setting limits and monitoring your scrolling behavior, you can foster healthier online habits and enjoy a more balanced digital experience.

Key Features:

- Customizable Time Limits: Set specific time limits for each website to stay mindful of your online time.

- Scroll Distance Monitoring: Track how far you've scrolled in real-time, helping you put your habits in measurable perspective.

- Reset Intervals: Customize how frequently your time limits reset for a balanced browsing experience.

- Privacy-Focused: We respect your privacy. No tracking or data collection, your information stays private.
